title: Erdinger - USBeverage
text: ABOUT THE BREWERY At the world’s largest wheat beer brewery, tradition and progress go hand in hand: our beer is brewed according to traditional recipes, but using state-of-the-art technology. Our roots are in Bavaria. We have been brewing exclusively in Erding since 1886 – every single bottle. And we have never brewed anything other than the Bavarian specialty “weissbier”. STYLE As a traditional brewery, we make no compromises when it comes to the German Purity Law, our top-class ingredients and our passion for Bavaria’s cultural heritage in the form of “weissbier”. Available styles: Erdinger Weissbier, 5.3% ABV; Erdinger Weissbier Dunkel, 5.3% ABV; Erdinger Weizen Kristall, 5.3% ABV: Erdinger Pikantus Weizen-Bock, 7.3% ABV; Erdinger Oktoberfest, 5.7% ABV; Erdinger Non-Alcoholic Also available in HELLES LAGER Draft As a brewer with heart and soul, Werner Brombach has been brewing the best authentic Bavarian Lager for the city and region of Erding for over 30 years. Quality without compromise: now and always in Erding! Erdinger Helles Lager has a smooth cheracter brewed with quality ingredients, it’s wonderfully mild. AVAILABLE IN: 50L (13.2 gallon) Kegs, 5.1%ABV INT.ERDINGER.DE
